INSTRUCTIONS FOR POPULATING THE APP
 
 
Step 1. 
Go to directory structure DITTimetableApp on your android device after app has been installed

Step 2. 
Create a text file called timetable.txt or download the template at https://goo.gl/XTVoTp

Step 3. 
Next read the instructions below on how to format your classes. This is manually entered in the syntax of the following :

1,hh,module,class_room, 
Keep in mind the following 
1. COMA , all fields must be separated by a coma 
2. Underscore _ for words such as web development ensure to leave no white space and use the underscore like so web_development 
3. No full stops or any other punctuation. 
It is important to follow these structure rules for mytimetable.txt file or else your timetable will not load. I have also included a template to use so you can just edit the fields to match your timetable.

EXAMPLE ENTRY: 
1,9,free,no_class, 
1,10,networking,Annex_3022,

NOTE: 
if you do not have a class a specific hour please enter No_Class and also for the room class room specify No_Class
